topics.title: FirstSpirit General Structure and Stores

topics.title: Page Templates
topics.description: Page templates provide the basic framework for a page and define the locations where editors can insert content. Includes information on page template structure, properties, forms, and rules.

topics.title: Section Templates
topics.description: Section templates are used to add content to the basic framework of a page. They contain input components for dynamic page content like text, tables, images, and datasets.

topics.title: Format Templates
topics.description: Format templates define text formatting options for editors. They control how formatted text content is rendered in different output channels.

topics.title: Link Templates
topics.description: Link templates define how links appear within a FirstSpirit project. They are used by input components to predefine link layout and behavior.

urls.description: Link templates - comprehensive link template guide

topics.title: Scripts and Script Templates
topics.description: Scripts allow functions that are not yet present in FirstSpirit to be implemented quickly using BeanShell. Covers script templates and scripting capabilities.
